game.name: DCS: P-51D Mustang - Operation Charnwood Campaign
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 캡션 이용 가능, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원
game.shortDescription: Created by the same team behind the Spitfire LF Mk.IX: Epsom Campaign, the Charnwood Campaign is a historically-based campaign for the P-51D Mustang over Normandy in July 1944. The Charnwood campaign reproduces P-51D missions flown in support of the allied breakout of Normandy and the eventual captu
